drink_packages.name: Cheers! Beverage Program
drink_packages.price_range: $59.95 - $64.95 per person per day plus 18% gratuity
drink_packages.limitations: 15 alcoholic drinks per 24-hour period, must be 21+ to purchase, all adults in same cabin must purchase

drink_packages.name: Deluxe Beverage Package
drink_packages.description: Royal Caribbean's premium all-inclusive drink package
drink_packages.price_range: $63 - $89 per person per day plus 18% gratuity
drink_packages.limitations: Drinks up to $13 value, all adults in same cabin must purchase

drink_packages.name: Premium Plus Beverage Package
drink_packages.description: Norwegian's top-tier unlimited beverage package with premium brands
drink_packages.price_range: $98 - $128 per person per day plus 20% gratuity
drink_packages.limitations: No daily limit, includes drinks at private islands
